channel.title: Extinction v2 Release: 667
channel.description:
[U][B][SIZE=6]Extinction Version 2 Release. [/SIZE][/B][/U]
[B][SIZE=2]EXV2 is a 667-714 release by Poanizer. It is an edited Zenith base but most bugs have been fixed.[/SIZE][/B]
[B][U]Images[/U][/B]
[url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3705237/1.png][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3705237/1.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3705239/2.PNG][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3705239/2.PNG[/img][/url] [url=http://www.upload.ee/image/3705241/3.PNG][img]http://www.upload.ee/thumb/3705241/3.PNG[/img][/url]
[B][U]Credits:[/U][/B] -Poanizer -Steel Kiwi -Victorious -Zenith -Matrix?
[SIZE=2][B][U]Features:[/U][/B][/SIZE]
[B][U]Pvm:[/U][/B] -Nex -Corp -GWD (no killcount) -Tormented Demons -Evil Chickens -Steel Kiwi Boss -Nomad (Drops havnt been added) -DKS -Lucien -Ice titans -Sea Troll Queen
[B][U]PvP:[/U][/B] -Safe pvp -Clan wars (safe/dangerous) -Death Match Arena -Wilderness Pking
[B][U]Skilling:[/U][/B] -Semi low Rate (Non combat) -All skills avaliable -Max cape rewarded when maxed
[B][U] Donatorzone:[/U][/B] -Donator skilling zone -Skilling benefits -Donator Only Items
[B][U]Other information:[/U][/B] -Lots of commands for each rank (besides donators) -Shops replace GE due to the GE bug. But Ge is still in game if wanted. -Home is Mos Le Harmless. -Few Custom Items -Prestige system (sorted shops) -Custom Clothes Changer -Custom Clothes Colour Changer -Full Summoning obelisk -Auto Voting was removed due to the method. (GTL VOTE) -Custom emote commands
[B][U]Download:[/U][/B] Source, Cache and Client all in one.
Link 1: [url=https://mega.co.nz/#!Z8NhlLBZ!Q2kCdAslBMQ4LzL0Mf90d1OneUZh2CH2bPaMgFeHpcQ]https://mega.co.nz/#!Z8NhlLBZ!Q2kCdAslBMQ4LzL0Mf90d1OneUZh2CH2bPaMgFeHpcQ[/url]
Shortened: [url=http://goo.gl/33Czaq]http://goo.gl/33Czaq[/url]
[b]Watch this video after download![/b] http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HxGFaEAe_Wc&feature=gp-n-y
[B][U]Videos[/U][/B]
[B][U]EXv2 Release Video[/U][/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Hly6tLQ03qc&feature=youtu.be]Extinction V2 - YouTube[/url]
[B][U](Outdated Promo Video)[/U][/B] [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ja5Turghvic]Banana Poon is Open. ( 2:20 Minutes only, the rest is black) - YouTube[/url]

item.title: Extinction v2 Release: 667
item.dc:creator: @lardain lardain
item.description:
@lardain wrote:

It is a really nice release. Nice release bro.

For the people who want to change the background:
The background could be changed using an cache editor (duhhh…) Make sure you cropped your image as the background is 6 or 8 parts, not sure.

Make urself owner: Search for the login method. and just add a easy method in that checks for your username. Make it set your rights to 2 wich would work just fine. Than look in the commands what other int/boolean is used for using curtain commands and add that in the login method aswell.

EXPLORE THE SOURCE, don`t host a source without even knowing how the source works. Just mess around first and look what is what. This will look better for you to host a server like this.

And if I`m not wrong poanizer actually has a tutorial on how to use his source somewhere.

Hope this helps you all putting up a server like this. And again Poanizer. You did a really good job.

Read full topic

item.title: Extinction v2 Release: 667
item.dc:creator: @poanizer poanizer
item.description:
@poanizer wrote:

[i]"Correct me if I'm wrong but if this has some Zenith stuff "[/i]
It was a zenith base I just developed it a bit. To me it ran fine on 4 servers I made. Running it wasnt a problem but there were a few bugs which I think I have fixed most of.
[i]"thing i cannot do is unban people[/i]"
Yea I didnt know how to fix the ban command so I made a Disable command. kinda newb but does the same thing really.
[i]"Has that command glitch been patched aswell?"[/i]
Thats never happened to me? sounds like someone put like reflects on it so you cant change the owner? Setrights works on this source but you need to be owner. rights 12 not 7.
[i]"I know the setrights command doesn't work."[/i]
It works your probably doing it wrong. its setrights (rank) (name). and you need to be rights 12 to do it.
[i]"hello can any help me? i cant make me donator"[/i]
::pemdonator (name)
[i]"This source is EXTREMELY unstable."[/i]
How? :o
[i]"Please help i cant find it Player.Java"[/i]
src/com/rs/player/player.java
[i]"How do i change the login background ?"[/i]
Look in extras/gfx
[i]"nice release mate, like your vids also"[/i]
Thank you :)

Read full topic

item.title: Extinction v2 Release: 667
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

ky sorcerer:

Has that command glitch been patched aswell? When i was testing the “Zenith Scape” Source/Client the server made many problems occur when i gave owner rights to another account. When they, or i had used an owner command, it would either kill us, hurt our character or not work at all.

Well those who have rights don’t have problems, however, I know the setrights command doesn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Extinction v2 Release: 667
item.dc:creator: @ky_sorcerer ky sorcerer
item.description:
@ky_sorcerer wrote:

Has that command glitch been patched aswell? When i was testing the “Zenith Scape” Source/Client the server made many problems occur when i gave owner rights to another account. When they, or i had used an owner command, it would either kill us, hurt our character or not work at all.
Soul the set rights command works. if you changed the owner name to yours in player.java and Commands.java then type setrights name number, like so
setrights zenith 7
gives zenith owner rights,
i have a feeling you already knew this though, i hope it helped!

Read full topic

I also am wondering how to take off the no trading without a 500 total level? I looked through Trade.java and Player.java, neither mentioned it. Any ideas?

Read full topic
